languages.text: {n}Несмотря на множественные раны, Соломон стоит твердо. Глаза проктора горят, словно у него открылось второе дыхание.{/n} "Мой отряд пал, нужна перегруппировка. Действуем так: я иду с вами, один из вашей свиты остается руководить обороной точки вместе с выжившими Арбитес".

{n}Despite multiple wounds, Solomorne stands firm. The Proctor's eyes are burning bright, like he has gotten a second wind.{/n} "My squad is down. We need to regroup. Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving Arbitrators."
languages.original_text: {n}Несмотря на множественные раны, Соломон стоит твердо. Глаза проктора горят, словно у него открылось второе дыхание.{/n} "Мой отряд пал, нужна перегруппировка. Действуем так: я иду с вами, один из вашей свиты остается руководить обороной точки вместе с выжившими Арбитес".

traits.locale_text: {n}Despite multiple wounds, Solomorne stands firm. The proctor's eyes are burning bright as if he had gotten a second wind.{/n} "My squad is down, we need to regroup. Here is a plan: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defense with the surviving arbiters."

Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving arbiters."

Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving arbiters."

Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving Arbitrators."

{n}Despite multiple wounds, Solomorne stands firm. The Proctor's eyes are burning bright, like he has gotten a second wind.{/n} "My squad is down. We need to regroup. Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving Arbitrators."

languages.text: {n}A pesar de sus múltiples heridas, Solomorne se mantiene en pie. Los ojos del Procurador arden con fuerza, como si hubiera recuperado las energías.{/n} «Mi escuadrón ha caído. Debemos reagruparnos. Esto es lo que haremos: yo iré con usted y alguien de su séquito se quedará para encargarse de las defensas junto con los Arbitrator restantes».
languages.original_text: {n}Despite multiple wounds, Solomorne stands firm. The Proctor's eyes are burning bright, like he has gotten a second wind.{/n} "My squad is down. We need to regroup. Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}A pesar de sus múltiples heridas, Solomorne se mantiene en pie. Los ojos del Procurador arden con fuerza, como si hubiera recuperado las energías.{/n} «Mi escuadrón ha caído. Debemos reagruparnos. Esto es lo que haremos: yo iré con usted y alguien de su séquito se quedará para encargarse de las defensas junto con los Arbitrator restantes».

languages.text: {n}尽管多处负伤，但索罗蒙依然岿然不动。他的目光炯炯有神，仿佛获得了新的力量一样。{/n}“我的小队蒙受了伤亡，必须重新集结战斗成员。我们接下来这么办，我和你一起行动，你让其中一位随行人员留在这里，与存活的法务官一起维持防线。”
languages.original_text: {n}Despite multiple wounds, Solomorne stands firm. The Proctor's eyes are burning bright, like he has gotten a second wind.{/n} "My squad is down. We need to regroup. Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管多处负伤，但索罗蒙依然岿然不动。他的目光炯炯有神，仿佛获得了新的力量一样。{/n}“我的小队蒙受了伤亡，必须重新集结战斗成员。我们接下来这么办，我和你一起行动，你让其中一位随行人员留在这里，与存活的法务官一起维持防线。”

languages.text: {n}複数の傷にも関わらず、ソロモーンはしっかりと立っている。代理人の目は燃えるように輝き、彼は呼吸を回復したようである。{/n}「私の部隊は壊滅しました。再編成が必要です。これからこうします―私はあなたと行き、従者の一人が生き残りのアービトレイターとともに防衛の責任を取るために後方に留まります」
languages.original_text: {n}Despite multiple wounds, Solomorne stands firm. The Proctor's eyes are burning bright, like he has gotten a second wind.{/n} "My squad is down. We need to regroup. Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}複数の傷にも関わらず、ソロモーンはしっかりと立っている。代理人の目は燃えるように輝き、彼は呼吸を回復したようである。{/n}「私の部隊は壊滅しました。再編成が必要です。これからこうします―私はあなたと行き、従者の一人が生き残りのアービトレイターとともに防衛の責任を取るために後方に留まります」

languages.text: {n}Trotz zahlreicher Wunden bleibt Solomorne standhaft. In den Augen des Proktors lodert ein Feuer, als hätte er frischen Atem geschöpft.{/n} "Mein Trupp wurde aufgerieben. Wir müssen uns neu formieren. Wir gehen wie folgt vor: Ich komme mit Euch und jemand aus Eurem Gefolge bleibt zurück, um mit den verbleibenden Arbitratoren die Verteidigung zu organisieren."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite multiple wounds, Solomorne stands firm. The Proctor's eyes are burning bright, like he has gotten a second wind.{/n} "My squad is down. We need to regroup. Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}Trotz zahlreicher Wunden bleibt Solomorne standhaft. In den Augen des Proktors lodert ein Feuer, als hätte er frischen Atem geschöpft.{/n} "Mein Trupp wurde aufgerieben. Wir müssen uns neu formieren. Wir gehen wie folgt vor: Ich komme mit Euch und jemand aus Eurem Gefolge bleibt zurück, um mit den verbleibenden Arbitratoren die Verteidigung zu organisieren."

languages.text: {n}Malgré de multiples blessures, Solomorne tient bon. Les yeux du proctor brillent d'un feu sacré, comme s'il avait trouvé son second souffle.{/n} « Mon escouade est HS. Nous devons nous regrouper. Voilà ce que je propose : je vous accompagne et un membre de votre entourage reste à l'arrière pour superviser la défense avec les arbitrators qui ont survécu. »
languages.original_text: {n}Despite multiple wounds, Solomorne stands firm. The Proctor's eyes are burning bright, like he has gotten a second wind.{/n} "My squad is down. We need to regroup. Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving Arbitrators."

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré de multiples blessures, Solomorne tient bon. Les yeux du proctor brillent d'un feu sacré, comme s'il avait trouvé son second souffle.{/n} « Mon escouade est HS. Nous devons nous regrouper. Voilà ce que je propose : je vous accompagne et un membre de votre entourage reste à l'arrière pour superviser la défense avec les arbitrators qui ont survécu. »

languages.text: {n}Aldığı birçok yaraya rağmen Solomorne, dimdik ayakta duruyor. Üsteğmen'in gözleri, sanki yeniden doğmuş gibi parıldıyor.{/n} "Mangam katledildi. Toparlanmamız gerek. Şöyle yapacağız: Ben sizinle geleceğim, maiyetinizden biri de geride kalıp kalan Yargıcılarla birlikte savunma yapacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Despite multiple wounds, Solomorne stands firm. The Proctor's eyes are burning bright, like he has gotten a second wind.{/n} "My squad is down. We need to regroup. Here's what we do: I go with you, and one of your retinue stays behind to take charge of the defence along with the surviving Arbitrators."

Şöyle yapacağız: Ben sizinle geleceğim, maiyetinizden biri de geride kalıp kalan Yargıcılarla birlikte savunma yapacak."
